mapper.select: select * from one start with one_parent is null connect by prior one_no = one_parent order siblings by one_group desc, one_no asc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT one.*, (SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN o.one_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM one o WHERE o.one_parent = one.one_parent) AS has_status_zero FROM one START WITH one_parent IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR one_no = one_parent ORDER SIBLINGS BY one_group DESC, one_no ASC ) WHERE has_status_zero = 1 OR has_status_zero IS NULL ORDER BY one_date asc

choose.when: select count(*) from one where instr(${type},#{keyword})>0

mapper.update: select attach_no from one_image where one_no=${oneNo}
update one set one_status = #{oneStatus} where one_no = #{oneNo}
